OOC: okay if you say so.

Scorponok looks around him, he is about to be destroyed, and he didnt even
see it coming, he's been unconsious way to long. He looks to Megatron, and
realizes he let him down, he runs over to him, "computer self Destruct" he
shouts, "Agnoliged" it replies and he blows apart, hoping to open a passage
through the ground for Megatron to escape. "Farewell Megatron" he whispers
as he goes off in a brilliant flame.
